Package org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.fieldbuilder

Classes for automatically building a Binder and configuring and binding fields declaratively using FieldBuilder annotations.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFieldBuilder<S extends AbstractFieldBuilder<S,T>,T>
    Provides the machinery for auto-generated FieldBuilder-like classes.
    AbstractFieldBuilder.BindingInfo<T>
    Holds static information gathered for one bean property based on @FieldBuilder.Foo, @ProvidesField, @Binding, and @FieldBuilder.FormLayout annotations.
    AbstractFieldBuilder.BoundField
    Holds a bound field and its corresponding component.
    AbstractFieldBuilder.DefaultInfo
    Holds static information gathered from scanning @FieldBuilder.FieldDefault annotations.
    FieldBuilder<T>
    Automatically configures and bind fields using declarative method annotations.
    FieldBuilderCustomField<T>
    Support superclass that mostly automates the creation of CustomFields for editing any model type using sub-fields automatically generated from FieldBuilder annotations.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AbstractFieldBuilder.Binding
    Specifies properties of the Binder binding itself.
    AbstractFieldBuilder.FieldDefault
    Annotates methods returning alternate default values for some property of the various fields constructed by a FieldBuilder from @FieldBuilder.Foo declarative annotations.
    AbstractFieldBuilder.FormLayout
    Configures how FieldBuilder.addBoundFields() adds a generated field to a FormLayout.
    AbstractFieldBuilder.NullifyCheckbox
    Causes the field that would otherwise be used for a property to be wrapped in a NullableField.
    AbstractFieldBuilder.ProvidesField
    Specifies that the annotated method will create a field suitable for editing the specified property.
    FieldBuilder.BigDecimalField
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a BigDecimalField.
    FieldBuilder.Checkbox
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a Checkbox.
    FieldBuilder.CheckboxGroup
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a CheckboxGroup.
    FieldBuilder.ComboBox
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a ComboBox.
    FieldBuilder.CustomField
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a CustomField.
    FieldBuilder.DatePicker
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a DatePicker.
    FieldBuilder.DateTimePicker
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a DateTimePicker.
    FieldBuilder.EmailField
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a EmailField.
    FieldBuilder.EnumComboBox
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a EnumComboBox.
    FieldBuilder.GridMultiSelect
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a Grid converted to a multi-select field via Grid.asMultiSelect().
    FieldBuilder.GridSingleSelect
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a Grid converted to a single-select field via Grid.asSingleSelect().
    FieldBuilder.Input
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a Input.
    FieldBuilder.IntegerField
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a IntegerField.
    FieldBuilder.ListBox
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a ListBox.
    FieldBuilder.MultiSelectListBox
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a MultiSelectListBox.
    FieldBuilder.NumberField
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a NumberField.
    FieldBuilder.PasswordField
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a PasswordField.
    FieldBuilder.RadioButtonGroup
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a RadioButtonGroup.
    FieldBuilder.Select
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a Select.
    FieldBuilder.TextArea
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a TextArea.
    FieldBuilder.TextField
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a TextField.
    FieldBuilder.TimePicker
    Specifies how a Java bean property should be edited using a TimePicker.

Package org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.fieldbuilder Description

Classes for automatically building a Binder and configuring and binding fields declaratively using FieldBuilder annotations.
See Also:
FieldBuilder
